name: docker-selenium-javascript-nightwatch-setup
description: Raw model for a standard docker selenium JavaScript Nightwatch setup

scripts.start: npm run stop && docker-compose up -d selenium-hub chrome
scripts.start-all: npm run stop && docker-compose up -d selenium-hub chrome firefox
scripts.start_debug: npm run stop && docker-compose up -d selenium-hub chrome-debug
